mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(A.PAYMENT_DATE , '') AS paymentDate , IFNULL(A.PAYMENT_AMOUNT , '') AS amount , IFNULL(C.USER_CONTACT1 , '') AS userContact1 FROM DC_PAYMENT_SCHEDULE A INNER JOIN DC_RESERVE_MASTER B ON A.RM_IDX = B.RM_IDX INNER JOIN DC_USER_INFO C ON B.UR_IDX = C.UR_IDX WHERE A.PAYMENT_DATE = DATE_SUB(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d'), INTERVAL #{interval} DAY);
